mapper.sql: op.id, op.user_id, op.Import_lot, op.parts_type, op.sec, op.parts_number, op.cn_name, op.fr_name, op.en_name, op.sn_class as snClassFlag, op.parts_qty, op.production_cycle, op.supplier_id, op.dwg, op.note, op.revision, op.created_time, os.supplier_name, op.perfect_flag, op.synchronize_flag, op.id_class
mapper.select: select count(*) from ope_parts_draft op left join ope_supplier os on op.supplier_id = os.id and os.dr = 0

select parts.id as id, parts.parts_number as partsN, parts.sec as sec, parts.en_name as enName, parts.cn_name as cnName, parts.fr_name as frName, ifnull(parts.production_cycle, 0) as productionCycle from ope_parts parts
order by parts.created_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select sum(case when (perfect_flag = true and synchronize_flag = false) then 1 else 0 end) as value from ope_parts_draft opd where opd.dr =0 and opd.user_id=#{userId}
select count(*) from ope_parts parts left join ope_supplier os on parts.supplier_id = os.id and os.dr = 0

select parts.id, parts.user_id, parts.Import_lot, parts.parts_type, parts.sec, parts.parts_number, parts.cn_name, parts.fr_name, parts.en_name, case when (parts.sn_class='1') then 'SC' else 'SSC' end as snClassFlag, parts.parts_qty, parts.production_cycle, parts.supplier_id, parts.dwg, parts.note, parts.revision, parts.created_time, os.supplier_name, parts.synchronize_flag, parts.id_class from ope_parts parts left join ope_supplier os on parts.supplier_id = os.id and os.dr = 0
order by parts.created_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
